alert.note: Alert for West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 2:18PM MDT until April 01 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches in the valleys, with 8 to 16 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting to 30 mph in the valleys and as high as 45 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...West Central Mountains zone. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue in this area Saturday night and Sunday, but with a less intensity and with weaker winds.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
